summary: Two siblings from the Varro family in Cyrodiil.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#e42217][b][center][/center][/b][/color][color=#e42217][b]The Varros Standalone Followers
[/b][/color]
By: JetRock



Arcadius and Rosalia are son and daughter of a late Imperial Navy Admiral Romulus Varro who died in Great War against Aldmeri, who also still has a lineage from a legendary champion Larrius Varro who lived in Morrowind on The 3rd Era. One day, Rosalia went into Skyrim to find some rare books in Winterhold, it was her hobby, but the situation has getting worse there as the civil war escalated, realizing that her daughter might get caught in dangerous situation, her mother Aelia, ask Arcadius which also a top tier fighter guild member to depart for Skyrim to escort his sister return to home safely.


[center][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/70595-0-1445561650.jpg[/img][/center]

They finally met in Windhelm, Arcadius persuade his sister to return to Cyrodiil, on the way back home, they stopped at Vilemyr Inn, suddenly a loud and scary voice followed by a quake happen for a sec, Wilhelm of Vilemyr Inn told them to not to worry, it is the call of the Greybeards and it was a sign that soon a dragonborn will pass through this village, to climb the 7000 steps mountain to fullfill his/her pilgrimage, Rosalia was fascinated by the story, and her brother also agreed that this is a rare opportunity to see and meet a Dragonborn directly, so they decided to stay longer in Ivarstead.



[center][b][color=#ffd966]==Basic Info==[/color][/b]


[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/70595-3-1445561650.jpg[/img] [img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/70595-2-1445561650.jpg[/img]


Other Notes:
-They are essential and level up with player,
-They are marriageable.


[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/70595-1-1445561650.jpg[/img]


What's New in Version 2.0:
-New Hairstyle for Arcadius and Rosalia, from the KS Hairdos Renewal,
-Arcadius and Rosalia appearances has been revised, also sculpted for getting a smoother face
(this is first time I dare to use racemenu sculpt feature, it wasn't as 'dangerous' as I thought earlier :p),
-Additional accessories from Ashara Dimonized Dress and Jewelry.[/center]

[center][youtube]u9yKAQ_wypg[/youtube][/center]
[center]By: wacilleboss[/center]


[b][color=#ffd966][center]==Installation==[/center][/color][/b]

1. Extract the downloaded file, copy the contents of the extracted files (meshes, textures, and .esp) to the Data folder in your Skyrim installation folder,
2. Activate the corresponding (.esp) on your Data Files in Skyrim launcher or using Nexus Mod Manager.

OR

Use a Mod Organizer.



[b][color=#ffd966][center]==Uninstallation==[/center][/color][/b]

Just delete all the files that come from this mod in the Data folder in your Skyrim installation folder, and beware that Rosalia and Arcadius should be dismissed and your character should be in different cell from them on the latest save before uninstalling.



[b][center][b][color=#ffd966]==Updating==[/color][/b][/center][/b]

Before you updating to the newer version, please remove/uninstall the old version first.



[b][color=#ffd966][center]==Compatibilities==[/center][/color][/b]

-I personally recommend [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33002/?]FLP[/url] for getting the best follower experiences,
-So far, this mod doesn't cause any trouble with 215 active mods on my Skyrim.
